name: Skale-Smacking Stick

name: Ash Legion Shield

name: Centurion's Tactical Rifle
description:
"This is what makes us different. We provide long range covering fire, surpressing the enemy so our mortar teams are exponentially more effective."
—Centurion Truthbringer

name: Blood Legion Shield
description:
"Conquer all."
—Blood Legion Motto

name: Magister's Staff
description:
"Careful with this one. The Priory tends to add a little extra enchantment or two for magisters."
—Magister Razermane

name: Magister's Scepter
description:
"We magisters tend to get the better equipment. You helped us with the Flame Legion, ghosts, and research. I owe you something."
—Magister Razermane

name: Hellion Axe
description:
"The inscriptions from the exorcism guide are read while the blade is forged."
—Scholar Worfmir

name: Scout's Harpoon
description:

name: Ash Legion Shield
description: <c=@flavor>"Don't be seen."</c>

description:

—Sentinel Jaggedclaw
